title: Not Joyless
description:
Live from the 'Step Up for Colleen 5K,' Kirk welcomes in his former radio partner Gerry Callahan. After last years 'joyless' appearance, Kirk & Gerry rebounded with a more joyful experience. The two compare their battles with Covid-19 that saw one man on the verge of death and the other getting on a plane for vacation maskless. Gerry loses a good friend over his tweets, Kirk gets a nice hug from Blades, the Boston Bruins mascot & much more.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/kminshow
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
